underlying_goal: Understand and document the complete 8-step operational workflow system in the Rohan project, including all input/output variables, data flows, and frontend-backend interactions
friction_detail: Initial grep patterns assumed dictionary structures instead of dataclass objects, and a Python script errored when accessing STEP_DEFINITIONS as list of dicts.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to analyze and document an 8-step workflow system's architecture and all input/output variables across frontend and backend, and Claude successfully produced comprehensive documentation covering 50+ variables and complete data flows.
